name: Collect the coins (jaslin joo)
description:
collect the coins

it is a simple yet challenging jumping game!

gameplay:

> you will have 3 lives

> collect as many coins as possible

> there will be boosts for you to boost your character!

> there are also some obstacles to avoid!

features:

> the player will only have to control using left and right arrow on the keyboard

> endless jumping!
